GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
clocksource/drivers/exynos_mct: Handle DTS with higher number of interrupts

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit a81de4315ecf5a401212154dad0168a0cb9ed857, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit 36ba5d527e9567ed303bad6e86a5f3c2723470f6. For more details please see the references link.
